title: Did not receive any icon for "Xayah & Rakan"  event

embed.description: Unlike other champs, Xayah and Rakan can be gifted using IP between April 19-26! Gift Xayah or Rakan to a friend for just 6300 IP (normally 7800 IP) and unlock an exclusive Summoner Icon for yourself (also works if you gift using RP).

body: I did both icon event for "Xayah & Rakan" 26th,   but  I still did not get the icons

replies.body:
The event did officially end on the 26th, but fret not! We're still in the process of sending out everyone's icons, but if you don't get yours by **March 10th** then go ahead and shoot us a ticket so that we can get that fixed

EDIT: May 10th, definitely not March 10th as that's already passed xD
So if May 10th does pass how would we go about notifying such? A ticket request or another submission to the community?
Please tell me you mean May 10th. I don't wanna wait almost a year to start whining at you guys. xD
I did indeed mean May 10th xD! Oops my bad ^_^

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=odxBmbW1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-06T03:46:48.447+0000)
>
> The event did officially end on the 26th, but fret not! We're still in the process of sending out everyone's icons, but if you don't get yours by **March 10th** then go ahead and shoot us a ticket so that we can get that fixed

Gift Xayah or Rakan to a friend for just 6300 IP (normally 7800 IP) and unlock an exclusive Summoner Icon for yourself (also works if you gift using RP).

I still did not receive this icon, but I did receive the other event icon. How can I submit a ticket? I don't see a proper option in the submit a request category. Please help. Thank you in advance!
Don't worry that you haven't gotten the other icon, since they are all still going out. If you don't have them by **May 10th**,  then you should reach out to us.

it can take up to TWO weeks AFTER the event ends to receive them.

after the two weeks ends and you still did not get them, then send in a ticket.

It's May 10th and I am still having this issue. Both my friend and I have not received the Icon yet. We both received the play 2 games with zayah and rakan icon but not the gift with 6300 ip icon. I put it in the report a bug page on the client. Is that what I should have done?

I'm in the same boat, sent gift on the 24th +^_^+
As it is the hype train will have derailed by May 10. Rito really needs to work on sending out promo stuff a little faster...
